title: Amazon drops Apple's M4 16-inch MacBook Pro to $2,249 in latest sale
description: Amazon's deals for the New Year continue to trickle in, with today's latest markdown hitting Apple's current 16-inch MacBook Pro.Save $250 on Apple's latest 16-inch MacBook Pro.Pick up the standard 16-inch MacBook Pro in Space Black with an M4 Pro chip for just $2,249 at your choice of Amazon or B&H Photo heading into the weekend. This 2025 discount for the New Year brings the M4 Pro model down to the lowest price across leading Apple resellers.Buy for $2,249 Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Amazon's deals for the New Year continue to trickle in, with today's latest markdown hitting Apple's current 16-inch MacBook Pro.
text: Amazon's deals for the New Year continue to trickle in, with today's latest markdown hitting Apple's current 16-inch MacBook Pro. Pick up the standard 16-inch MacBook Pro in Space Black with an M4 Pro chip for just $2,249 at your choice of Amazon or B&H Photo heading into the weekend. This 2025 discount for the New Year brings the M4 Pro model down to the lowest price across leading Apple resellers. Buy for $2,249 As mentioned above, this is the standard model, which features a 14-core CPU, 20-core GPU, 24GB of unified memory and 512GB of storage. But if you're looking for extra RAM, storage, or even the M4 Max chip, it's worth checking out the available discounts in our 16-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide. We've also compiled the top MacBook Pro deals across screen sizes, so if you're looking for offers on the 14-inch models you can hit up our dedicated roundup or jump straight to the lowest prices in our Mac Price Guide.
html:
Amazon's deals for the New Year continue to trickle in, with today's latest markdown hitting Apple's current 16-inch MacBook Pro.

Pick up the standard 16-inch MacBook Pro in Space Black with an M4 Pro chip for just $2,249 at your choice of Amazon or B&H Photo heading into the weekend. This 2025 discount for the New Year brings the M4 Pro model down to the lowest price across leading Apple resellers.

Buy for $2,249

As mentioned above, this is the standard model, which features a 14-core CPU, 20-core GPU, 24GB of unified memory and 512GB of storage. But if you're looking for extra RAM, storage, or even the M4 Max chip, it's worth checking out the available discounts in our 16-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide.

We've also compiled the top MacBook Pro deals across screen sizes, so if you're looking for offers on the 14-inch models you can hit up our dedicated roundup or jump straight to the lowest prices in our Mac Price Guide.
